name: Diamond Collection - Virgin Brazilian Silk
description:
Onyx Brazilian Hair™ has a thick soft texture much similar to African American natural hair. It’s very full looking and is very versatile in styling and can hold curls very well. It’s sleek, soft and has a natural wave to it when wet.

Onyx Hair is natural, shed and tangle free. Our hair extensions will help you to achieve a full, sexy, carefree look!

3.5 oz-4 oz per bundle, 3 bundles will achieve a full weave unless you purchase lengths over 16”. Longer lengths customers should purchase 4 bundles for a full weave.

Hair can be dyed easily to achieve the color desired

The Onyx Hair Collection is 100% virgin grade 6A beautiful hair, that will last for months to come.

Natural colors available: Dark Brown/Off-Black

Each bundle is:

100% Unprocessed Virgin Hair
Reusable
Premium Quality
Tangle-Free
Full Cuticle
3 bundles (4+ bundles needed for a full sew-in)
Minimal Shedding
Micro-Machine Wefted

name: Diamond Collection - Virgin Peruvian
description:
Onyx Peruvian Hair™ is very rare hair type. It is lite weight, very “feather like” and silkier than Indian and Brazilian Hair. It blends well with relaxed African American, Caucasian and Hispanic hair. This Peruvian Virgin hair is very versatile and can blend-in quite unnoticed with your own hair.

Onyx Hair is natural, shed and tangle free. Our hair extensions will help you to achieve a full, sexy, carefree look!

3.5 oz-4 oz per bundle, 3 bundles will achieve a full weave unless you purchase lengths over 16”. Longer lengths customers should purchase 4 bundles for a full weave.

Hair can be dyed easily to achieve the color desired

The Onyx Hair Collection is 100% virgin grade 6A beautiful hair, that will last for months to come.

Natural colors available: Dark Brown/Off-Black

Each bundle is:

100% Unprocessed Virgin Hair
Reusable
Premium Quality
Tangle-Free
Full Cuticle
3 bundles (4+ bundles needed for a full sew-in)
Minimal Shedding
Micro-Machine Wefted

name: Diamond Collection - Virgin Cambodian
description:
Onyx Cambodian Hair™ has a slightly thick texture and is a good match with some Caucasian, Hispanic, and relaxed African American hair.

Onyx Hair is natural, shed and tangle free. Our hair extensions will help you to achieve a full, sexy, carefree look!

name: Marquise Collection - Virgin Uzbek Velvet
description:
Onyx Uzbek Hair™ is known for its sleek manageability, strength and length. It is medium-coarse which means hair follicles are thicker allowing it to be dyed from virgin black to platinum blonde.. Our Onyx Uzbek Virgin hair is the only hair type that can withstand extreme processing without degrading the hair quality. Style it with curls, wear it straight or add water to warrant a soft natural wavy as well as other hair types.

Onyx Hair is natural, shed and tangle free. Our hair extensions will help you to achieve a full, sexy, carefree look!

3.5 oz-4 oz per bundle, 3 bundles will achieve a full weave unless you purchase lengths over 16”. Longer lengths customers should purchase 4 bundles for a full weave.

Hair can be dyed easily to achieve the color desired

The Onyx Hair Collection is 100% virgin grade 6A beautiful hair, that will last for months to come.

Natural colors available: Dark Brown/Off-Black

Each bundle is:

100% Unprocessed Virgin Hair 
Reusable 
Premium Quality 
Tangle-Free 
Full Cuticle 
3 bundles (4+ bundles needed for a full sew-in) 
Minimal Shedding 
Micro-Machine Wefted

name: Marquise Collection - Virgin Burmese
description:
Onyx Burmese Hair™ is not too widely known but its is gorgeous and a favorite of many that do know it. Burmese hair is cross between Chinese and Indian hair. It is healthy, resilient and full bodied. It is naturally straight with a slight curl at the end. Burmese hair is well suited for people of African decent and those that like naturally straight hair.

Onyx Hair is natural, shed and tangle free. Our hair extensions will help you to achieve a full, sexy, carefree look!

3.5 oz-4 oz per bundle, 3 bundles will achieve a full weave unless you purchase lengths over 16”. Longer lengths customers should purchase 4 bundles for a full weave.

Hair can be dyed easily to achieve the color desired

The Onyx Hair Collection is 100% virgin grade 6A beautiful hair, that will last for months to come.

Natural colors available: Dark Brown/Off-Black
